context: Hi there. Can you suggest some good sci-fi movie? I love Star Trek (2009) and Star Wars (1977) , but maybe something outside of those genres?
Oh, man. I haven't seen that in FOREVER. It is great!!
I also like The Hills Have Eyes (1977)
I think I have that on DVD, too.
Did you ever see Never Let Me Go (2010)
Is The Hills Have Eyes (1977) a scary one? No, I've never seen Never Let Me Go (2010) . Is that sci-fi?
resp: Yes The Hills Have Eyes (1977) was scary for me!
